author: deguio
body:
this PR complements what was done by @abdoulline in #21810 and takes care of:
- setting thresholds to old values when the 2018 collapsed scenario is used
- setting thresholds to old values for HLT

this PR needs #21842 to be merged first

@kpedro88 @mariadalfonso @hatakeyamak
title: custom calotowers for collapsed scenario and hlt
